name: vscode-auto-hide-panel
description: Automatically hide the unnecessary panels when the user writes into a text editor.
author: Taras Shashurin

vscode-auto-hide-panel.autoHideSideBar.description: Automatically hide the side bar when the user starts typing into a text editor.

vscode-auto-hide-panel.autoHideAuxiliary.description: Automatically hide the auxiliary bar (second side bar) when the user starts typing into a text file.

vscode-auto-hide-panel.autoHidePanel.description: Automatically hide the panel (output, terminal, etc.) when the user starts typing into a text editor.

vscode-auto-hide-panel.autoHideChangesCo.description: Number of changes before the panel is automatically hidden.
